participant_1.background:
I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten.
i work for an architect firm.
I went on a quilting retreat in the mountains with my friends.
i have an autograph collection with more than 2000 signatures.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

participant_2.background:
I will take my golden retriever puppy to the park to play.
I sometimes spend hours watching cooking shows instead of actually cooking.
i m an ovo vegetarian.
i enjoy being outside.
i drive a four wheel drive vehicle.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for fun?
Hi! I enjoy going to the park with my golden retriever puppy.
That sounds fun! I love dogs. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever puppy named Bailey. She's a lot of fun!
That's awesome! I've always wanted a golden retriever.
They're great dogs! They're so friendly and loving.
I bet they're great for playing fetch.
They are! Bailey loves to play fetch.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to watch cooking shows. I love to cook, but I'm not very good at it.
I love to cook too! I'm pretty good at it, I think.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta. I make a really good pesto pasta.
That sounds delicious! I love pesto pasta.
I'm glad! I'm sure Bailey would love it too.
She definitely would! She loves all food.
I guess that's a good thing for a dog to love!
It is! It makes it easy to feed her.
I'm sure she's a very happy dog.
She is! She's the best dog ever
